nodes.text: The Candoras sector was a Outer Rim sector in the galaxy, located near the Unknown Regions.
Located near Wild Space and Unknown Regions, the Candoras sector was considered by the Galactic Republic as a bulwark against potential threats from both those areas.

During the Galactic Civil War, it was overseen by Governor Bidor Ferrouz and defended by the Candoras Sector Fleet. In 0 ABY, Ferrouz contacted the Alliance to Restore the Republic to offer the Rebellion a base in the sector.
